pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to Your 'IBM Acoustic' Data // Authentication can be the most difficult part about working with a new API. 'ibmAcousticR' facilitates making a connection to the 'IBM Acoustic' email campaign management API and executing various queries. The 'IBM Acoustic' API documentation is available at https://developer.ibm.com/customer-engagement/docs/. This package is not supported by 'IBM'.
